meanings.definition: A white or gray opaque area on the cornea of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leucomas on their cornea.
meanings.sent2: Her leucomas on the cornea made her vision blurry.
meanings.sent3: The leucomas on the cornea looked like a tiny cloud floating in the eye.
meanings.sent4: The leucomas on the cornea cast a shadow over her sight.
meanings.sent5: The leucomas on the cornea resembled a small patch of fog on a window.

meanings.definition: A white or gray opaque area on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The dermatologist identified the leucomas on her skin as a common condition.
meanings.sent2: The leucomas on his skin were a result of a fungal infection.
meanings.sent3: The leucomas on her skin looked like tiny snowflakes scattered across her arm.
meanings.sent4: The leucomas on his skin seemed to blend with the pale moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The leucomas on her skin stood out like patches of chalk on a blackboard.
